message: be a rebel and try to get the underdog position
oh and off course Adwords ;-) it pays off

get your hustle on, look for a blog in your space and have the blogger look at your site, get a site on digg or reddit, give referals to people that would promo you on G+ and facebook and twitter there is so many ways you just have to think and be creative otherwise it will not work
The same way you do. Created hype, interest, and sharing.

While I haven't got access to lot's of design talent, we're still doing our best to let the personality flood out . Also set up a blog and share your opinions, again we did this at http://hashbo.posterous.com - you need to develop a story around what you're doing.

Be creative, find out what *your* personality it is and amp it up! Make people love or hate you - divide opinions, don't try and please everyone - ignore peoples opinions and listen to their needs. Let you project take on a personality, stand for something, stand up and stand out.
Do you have a link somewhere with your ideas so far?
Try to infuse that personality into your teaser or landing page - we've tried to give a fun, open and simple feel to ourselves over at http://hashbo.com
